com.example.survivorbuddy4mobile

Class BuddyMessageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.example.survivorbuddy4mobile.BuddyMessageService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class BuddyMessageService
extends android.app.Service
    A service controlled by MessageActivity. Handled the start/stop of BuddyMessageServer. Relays content received by BuddyMessageServer to MessageActivity.

        private void getDisplayMessage()
        Reads bytes from a PipedInputStream connected to a BuddyMessageServer and sends them to MessageActivity as a broadcast. Continues until pipe is closed
